Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to ensuring that handheld computers used to enforce parking laws, rules and regulations access information from the department of transportation’s sign information system.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to allowing parking at missing or broken meters or muni-meters up to the maximum time permitted in that parking meter zone.
